betweenCallersLines.text: Fascinating stuff. Let's see who else is on the line.
Alright, we've got more callers waiting. Let's keep this going.
The board's lighting up tonight! Let's go to our next caller!
Interesting call. But we've got more stories to hear. Next caller, you're on.
More callers in the queue. Let's see what else is out there.
That's what I love about this show - you never know what's coming next. Speaking of which...
Additional callers are waiting. Proceeding to next interaction.

deadAirFillerLines.text: While we're waiting for the next caller, let me tell you about something interesting I read recently...
You know, I've been thinking about the nature of reality lately. What is real, and what isn't?
Keep those calls coming in, folks. The lines should be lighting up any moment now.
In the meantime, let's talk about government cover-ups. You know they exist.
The phone lines are quiet right now, but that doesn't mean the truth is silent.
While we wait, let me share a little known fact about Area 51...
The night is young, and so are the mysteries we're about to uncover.
Stay on the line, folks. Your call could be the one that breaks the story.
I've seen things that would make your hair stand on end. And we're just getting started.
The truth is out there, and tonight we're going to find some of it.
WOW! This is incredible! While we wait, let me tell you about this amazing sighting!
Heh, this is hilarious. Let me share this funny story while we wait...
Interesting development. Let me analyze this situation while we wait for calls.
Tch. While we wait for someone competent to call, let me rant about this.
Ugh, this is ridiculous. Why isn't anyone calling? Let me complain about it.
*yawn* Okay, while we wait... let me just rest my eyes for a second.

droppedCallerLines.text: Well, we lost that caller. Technical difficulties, folks. Happens sometimes.
Connection dropped. That's the third one tonight. The lines must be busy.
Sorry about that. We lost the caller. Let's try to get them back or move to the next one.
Technical glitch there. Don't worry, we'll get the next caller on.
Lost that connection. Happens in these old studios. Next caller, you're on.
WHOA! We lost that caller! That was intense! Next up!
Heh, that caller just... vanished. Poof! Okay, next caller!
Connection terminated. Analyzing the technical failure. Next caller.
Lost 'em. Figures. Next caller, don't waste my time.
UGH! Another dropped call! This is infuriating! NEXT!
*yawn* Lost the caller. Whatever. Next one.

breakTransitionLines.text: Alright folks, we're going to take a quick commercial break. Stay tuned, we'll be right back.
Time for a short break. We'll be back in just a moment with more calls.
We're going to pause for our sponsors. Don't go anywhere, the truth waits for no one.
Commercial break time. We'll return with more callers and more revelations.
Taking a break now. Stay with us, folks. The night is just beginning.
WHOA! Commercial break! We'll be BACK with MORE!
Heh, time for a break. Don't worry, we'll be back with more craziness.
Taking a brief intermission. We'll resume the investigation shortly.
Break time. Don't move. We'll be back.
Ugh, commercial break. As if we need more interruptions.
*yawn* Taking a break now. Wake me when we're back.

returnFromBreakLines.text: Alright folks, we're back from our sponsors. The lines are still open.
Welcome back, night owls. Coffee's kicking in again.
And we're back! The board's still lighting up - let's keep this momentum going!
Back from break. Hopefully with fewer interruptions this time.
We're back. Next caller, you're on the air.
Ah, the sweet sound of return music. Alright, who's next in line?
Commercial break concluded. Resuming broadcast operations.

offTopicRemarkLines.text: Okay, that was... definitely something. Moving on.
I don't know what that was, but let's pretend it didn't happen.
Folks, I apologize for that detour. Some people just like to hear their own voice.
And THAT is why we have a screening process. Anyway...
Okay then. Well. That didn't go where I expected. Who's next?
